price: নিশ্চয় আমি মানুহক সৰ্বোত্তম গঠনত সৃষ্টি কৰিছোঁ,
arabic: لَقَدۡ خَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ فِيٓ أَحۡسَنِ تَقۡوِيمٖ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: laqad khalaqnā al-insāna fī aḥsani taqwīmin
